name: Basically a Zombie Game
description:
You find yourself relentlessly battling against hordes of the undead, fighting until your last breathe... How long can you survive?



  • Unending waves of Zombies to fight...
  • Different types of weapons to aid your survival...
  • Unlockable areas to explore...
  • Upgradeable abilities...
  • Hidden Easter Eggs...

  • Survive 5 waves without opening any doors...
  • Unlock all areas of the cemetery...
  • Survive to round 10...
  • Purchase all abilities...
  • Special Zombies...
  • More Weapons...
  • Upgrade Machine...
  • Buyable Traps...
  • Bonus Drops...
  • Easter Egg Quest...
  • Boss Fight...
